headlines.headline: Shin kun san asalin cutar coronavirus?

items.summary: Cuta ce mai saurin yaduwa fiye da yadda ake zato. Idan mutum daya ya kamu, a cikin yini guda zai iya shafa wa mutum uku zuwa tara, in ji wani kwararre.

headlines.headline: Alamun Coronavirus: Abubuwan da suka kamata ku dinga yi

items.summary: A yayin da coronavirus ke ci gaba da yaduwa, ga wasu matakai da za ya kamata ku bi don kare kanku daga wannan cuta.

indexImage.altText: Coronavirus: Abubuwan da ya kamata ku dinga yi

items.name: Coronavirus a Afrika: Yadda alkaluman cutar suke kai tsaye
items.summary: Wannan taswira ce da ke kawo muku bayanan alkaluman cutar coronavirus a Afirka kai tsaye. Adadin mutanen da suka mutu da wadanda suka kamu da kuma wadanda suka warke.

headlines.headline: Yaushe za a samu riga-kafin cutar korona?

items.summary: Masana kimiyya na rige-rigen samar da riga-kafin cutar korona a yayin da cutar ke ci gaba da kisa a duniya.

items.summary: Wannan bidiyo ne da ya yi duba na musamman tare da yin bayani filla-filla kan harkokin kula da lafiya a Najeriya.

headlines.headline: Na'urar da ke sanya mutane ba da tazara a lambuna

items.summary: Na'urar na zagayawa a lambuna.

media.title: Na'urar da ke sanya mutane ba da tazara a lambunan

synopses.short: Coronavirus: Na'urar da ke sanya mutane ba da tazara a lambunan
synopses.long: An kera wata na'ura a kasar Singapore wadda aka aje a lambu domin ta rika tuna wa mutane su rika ba da tazara. Hukumomi a kasar sun ce suna yin amfani da na'urar a matsayin gwaji domin suka yadda mutane za su karbi abin. Sun ce idan aka karba da kyau za su kara sanya wasu da dama a wasu lambunan.
synopses.medium: Na'urar na zagayawa a lambuban tana

media.caption: Na'urar da ke sanya mutane ba da tazara a lambuna

headlines.headline: Ba gaskiya ba ne cewa ba a warkewa daga coronavirus

items.summary: Wasu na cewa wai ba a warkewa daga cutar, ba gaskiya ba ne. Ga Abdulbaki Jari da bayani cewa ana warkewa in ji hukumar kula da lafiya ta duniya.

media.title: Ba gaskiya ba ne cewa ba a warkewa daga coronavirus

synopses.short: Ba gaskiya ba ne cewa ba a warkewa daga coronavirus
synopses.long: Wasu na nuna kyama ga masu dauke da cutar coronavirus inda wasu ke ganin cewa ba a iya warkewa daga cutar, wannan ba gaskiya ba ne. Hukumar kula da lafiya ta duniya ta tabbatar da cewa ana iya warkewa daga cutar tangararas. Ga bayanin dan jarida mai sa ido a kan coronavirus Abdulbaki Jari.
synopses.medium: Wasu na cewa wai ba a warkewa daga cutar, ba gaskiya ba ne. Ga Abdulbaki Jari da bayani cewa ana warkewa in ji hukumar kula da lafiya ta duniya.

media.caption: Ba gaskiya ba ne cewa ba a warkewa daga coronavirus

headlines.headline: Ko Najeriya na cin galaba a yaƙi da annobar korona?

items.summary: Wata biyar kenan har yanzu waɗanda suka kamu da cutar korona a Najeriya ba su kai 50,000 ba.

indexImage.caption: Mako guda kenan alƙaluman masu kamuwa da cutar a kullum yana raguwa

headlines.headline: Yadda korona ta kassara wasu kamfanonin Najeriya

items.summary: Wannan annoba ta tursasa wa kamfanoni da dama korar ma'aikata, wasu 'yan kasuwa kuma suka samu karayar arziƙi sakamakon yadda abubuwa suka tsaya cik a lokacin kullen korona da ma bayan kullen a wasu ɓangarorin.

headlines.headline: Matar da ke jagorantar samar da maganin coronavirus

items.summary: Matar da ke jagorantar maganin cutar korona na aiki ne a Jami'ar Oxford kuma 'ya'yanta 'yan uku na daga cikin wadanda ke taimaka mata wajen samar da maganin.

indexImage.caption: Gilbert is a professor of vaccinology at Oxford University's Jenner Institute

imageThumbnail.altText: Prof Sarah Gilbert at Oxford University
imageThumbnail.caption: Professor Gilbert and her team are hoping to have a vaccine ready soon

headlines.headline: Me ya sa Amurkawa ke jin haushin sanya takunkumi?

items.summary: Yadda batun saka takunkumi domin kariya ya zama ce-ce-ku-ce tsakanin ɓangarorin siyasa a Amurka

headlines.headline: Ko gwajin yawu zai taimaka wajen kawo ƙarshen annobar korona?

items.summary: Ko gwajin yawu duk mako zai taimaka wajen dawo da rayuwa yadda take a da? Tawagar BBC ta lafiya ta yi bincike kan hakan.

persons.name: Fergus Walsh
persons.function: Corresponsal de Medicina de la BBC*

headlines.headline: Yadda cutar korona ta taimaka wa ma'aikata yin tattalin kuɗi

items.summary: Dokar kulle ta tagayara tattalin arzikin kananan ma'aikata, sai dai ga wadanda ma'aikatunsu suka ba su damar aiki daga gida abin sai san barka.

headlines.headline: Yadda cutar korona ke lalata ƙwaƙwalwa

items.summary: Wasu masana kimiyya sun ce cutar korona mai haifar da sarkewar numfashi ba ta huhu kawai take ƙisa ba, takan lalata ƙwaƙwalwa, kuma alamominta sun hada da ciwon kai da shanyewar barin jiki.

indexImage.altText: A toddler gets his temperature taken by a medical professional
indexImage.caption: Ba kasaifa yara suke fuskantar barazanar Covid-19 ba

headlines.headline: Shugabannin duniya 10 da suka karya dokokin coronavirus

items.summary: Firaministoci da shugabannin ƙasashe sun karya dokokin kulle da suka saka da kansu domin rage yaɗuwar cutar korona.

indexImage.caption: 'Yan kwanaki bayan sun yi wannan gaisawar ne Dakta Denis Protsenko ya kamu da cutar korona da ake yi wa laƙabi da Covid-19

headlines.headline: Me ya faru adadin masu korona ya yi ƙasa a Kano?

items.summary: Lamarin ya jefa taraddadi a zukatan ƙwararru game da abin da ke faruwa a jihar, wadda ke fama da ƙaruwar mace-macen da har yanzu ba a tabbatar da sanadinsu ba.

headlines.headline: Rayukan mutanen da suka salwanta saboda labaran ƙarya kan korona

items.summary: Wata tawagar BBC da ke bibiyar labaran bogi kan cutar korona ta gano wani abu da ke da alaka da cin zarafi da barnata kadarodi da kuma rasa rayuka - da kuma yiwuwar haifar da wata mummunar barnar a nan gaba.

byline.name: Daga Marianna Spring
byline.title: Wakili na musamman a yaki da labaran karya

items.summary: Kantunan sayar da kekuna a Burtaniya sun ce bukatar sabbin kekuna ta karu, haka kuma bukatar gyara tsofaffi ma ta daga.

indexImage.caption: Wasu masu tukin keke a nahiyar Turai

headlines.headline: Coronavirus: Abubuwan da har yanzu ba mu sani ba kan cutar

items.summary: Ga wasu daga cikin manyan amsoshi dangane da wannan cuta.

byline.name: Daga James Gallagher
byline.title: Wakilin BBC kan Lafiya da Kimiyya

headlines.headline: Doron kasa ya rage motsi saboda an killace mutane a gida

items.summary: Takunkumai da aka sa don yaki da Covid-19 na nufin takaita zirga-zirga a mota da jiragen kasa da ayyukan kamfanoni. Idan biliyoyin mutane suka rage yin wadannan abubuwan, yana sauya yadda doron kasa ke motsi.

indexImage.altText: Cities around the world have been deserted as people stay indoors due to coronavirus lockdowns.
indexImage.caption: Cities around the world have been deserted as people stay indoors due to coronavirus lockdowns.

headlines.headline: 'Coronavirus matsala ce ta siyasa, ba ta lafiya ba'

items.summary: Ta yaya Covid-19 za ta sauya duniya? Zabin da muka yi a yanzu zai daidaita rayuwarmu a shekaru masu zuwa, Masanin tarihi kuma marubuci Yuval Noah Harari ya shaida wa BBC.

indexImage.altText: A woman wearing a protective mask holds a leaf as a smile in France, on 29 March 2020
indexImage.caption: The outbreak is keeping us apart from each other, but will it change our social nature for ever?

headlines.headline: Iyayen da ke fama da yara marasa ji lokacin kullen coronavirus

items.summary: Yaushe yaranku ke matsa muku, ya kuke yi da matakin ba da tazara tsakaninku?

indexImage.altText: Generic image of a woman covering her face
indexImage.caption: Parents facing violence from their children say they need social support and more leeway from authorities

headlines.headline: Manyan annobar da suka taba shafar arewacin Najeriya

items.summary: Coronavirus ba ita ce annobar da duniya ta fara fuskanta ba, an sha samun annoba daruruwan shekaru da suka gabata a duniya, wadanda har gobe ana tuna illar su a tarihi.

headlines.headline: Shin annoba ba ta shiga garuruwan Makkah da Madina?

items.summary: Wannan dalili ya sa muka tuntubi wani malamin addinin Musulunci a Najeriya, wanda kuma ya yi karatu a Madina, shin ko gaskiya wannan magana tana da tushe a Musulunci?

headlines.headline: Mece ce alakar Coronavirus da fasahar 5G?

items.summary: Masana kimiya a duniya sun yi Allah-wadai da zargin wata kullalliya da ake ikirarin cewa fasahar intanet ta 5G ta taimaka wajen yada cutar coronavirus.

byline.name: Daga Rachel Schraer da Eleanor Lawrie
byline.title: Reality Check

indexImage.caption: Turken sadarwa na wayoyin salula ya kama da wuta a Birmingham da Merseyside, wanda ya haifar da bincike

headlines.headline: Hotunan tauraron dan adam na yadda coronavirus ta sauya duniya

items.summary: Hotunan da aka dauka da tauraron dan adam sun nuna yadda wasu wurare da aka sani da taruwar jama'a suka zama tamkar kufai sakamakon annobar coronavirus.

headlines.headline: Yadda annobar coronavirus ta sauya rayuwa a Birtaniya

items.summary: Hotuna daga fadin kasar kan yandda jama'a suka sauya yanayin gudanar da rayuwarsu sakamakon Covid-19.

indexImage.altText: A quiet bus passes the Bank of England
indexImage.caption: Household isolation, social distancing, working from home, avoidance of public gatherings have been recommended while public transport has been reduced in many towns and cities as part of protective measures to reduce the spread of the disease
